sentences.en: A patient will usually listen to the doctor's advice and act on it.
sentences.cn: 患者通常都会遵照医嘱行事。

sentences.en: Anne, you need to listen to me this time.
Calm down for a minute and listen to me.
Even the most apathetic students are beginning to sit up and listen.
sentences.cn: 连最不感兴趣的学生都开始坐直了听讲。

sentences.en: He got his coffee, came back and settled down to listen.
sentences.cn: 他喝了杯咖啡，回来后开始认真听讲。

sentences.en: Here, listen, they're talking about it on Radio-Paris right now.
sentences.cn: 嘿，听，巴黎电台正在谈论这事呢。

sentences.en: I just wanted to explore Paris, read Sartre, listen to Sidney Bechet.
sentences.cn: 我就想逛逛巴黎，读读萨特的作品，听听悉尼·贝谢的音乐。

sentences.en: I told him not to go, but he just wouldn’t listen.
sentences.cn: 我叫他不要去，可他就是不听。

sentences.en: Joyce traipsed from one doctor to another, praying that someone would listen.
sentences.cn: 乔伊丝从一位大夫奔波到另一位那里，期盼着有人会认真听她的话。

sentences.en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
sentences.cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

sentences.en: Listen to criticism but don't be crushed by it.
sentences.cn: 听取批评意见，但不要被它击垮。

sentences.en: Listen! There’s a strange noise in the engine.
sentences.cn: 听！引擎发出奇怪的声音。

sentences.en: She had effectively shut him out by refusing to listen.
sentences.cn: 她拒不听他说话，并以此有效地将他排除在外。

sentences.en: The company's top executives had refused to listen to reason.
sentences.cn: 公司的高层管理人员拒绝理智行事。

sentences.en: When I asked him to stop, he would not listen.
You had to listen hard to hear the old man breathe.
sentences.cn: 你要仔细听才能听见老人的呼吸声。

sentences.en: You're a powerful man — people will listen to you.
sentences.cn: 你是有影响力的人，大家会听你的。

trans.tran_en: to pay attention to what someone is saying or to a sound that you can hear

trans.tran_cn: 听， 仔细听， 留神听
